text: I wanted a tablet mainly to keep by my chair so I could look up stuff- such as information about movies I watch on TV- or answers to the New York Times crossword puzzle- or anything else I was curious about. I didn't want to spend much money- but was still dubious whether such an inexpensive tablet could be any good. I decided that for a measly fifty bucks (plus $20 for extra storage)- it was worth a shot. I found that it's perfect for my purposes - relatively fast and easy to use. I haven't used it for downloading or the like- but my guess is it'll be OK there- too. I'm happy I bought it.
title: Perfect for my uses and can't beat the price
